publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3997 Irene Oldfather: T in the Park—That the Parliament congratulates the organisers of the annual T in the Park music festival on its 10th anniversary this year; welcomes the recent launch of this year's event; notes the success of the venture in previous years; acknowledges the contribution that the festival makes to the tourism industry in Scotland; welcomes the opportunities it affords new musical talent in Scotland to be showcased, and wishes T in the Park every success for this year's event.

S1M-3997 Irene Oldfather: T in the Park-That the Parliament congratulates the organisers of the annual T in the Park music festival on its 10th anniversary this year; welcomes the recent launch of this year's event; notes the success of the venture in previous years; acknowledges the contribution that the festival makes to the tourism industry in Scotland; welcomes the opportunities it affords new musical talent in Scotland to be showcased, and wishes T in the Park every success for this year's event.
S1M-3997 T in the Park (lodged on 5 March 2003) Brian Fitzpatrick*, Scott Barrie*, Mr Keith Harding*
S1M-3997 T in the Park (lodged on 5 March 2003) Donald Gorrie*, Mr Tom McCabe*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3997 T in the Park (lodged on 5 March 2003) Michael Russell*
S1M-3997 T in the Park (lodged on 5 March 2003) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Cathie Craigie*, Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-3997 T in the Park (lodged on 5 March 2003) Margaret Jamieson*, Bill Butler*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
S1M-3997 T in the Park (lodged on 5 March 2003) Kate Maclean*, Nora Radcliffe*, Murdo Fraser*, Karen Gillon*
S1M-3997 T in the Park (lodged on 5 March 2003) Robin Harper*
S1M-3997 T in the Park (lodged on 5 March 2003) Helen Eadie*, Karen Whitefield*
S1M-3997 T in the Park (lodged on 5 March 2003) Marilyn Livingstone*

S1M-3997 Irene Oldfather: T in the Park—That the Parliament congratulates the organisers of the annual T in the Park music festival on its 10th anniversary this year; welcomes the recent launch of this year's event; notes the success of the venture in previous years; acknowledges the contribution that the festival makes to the tourism industry in Scotland; welcomes the opportunities it affords new musical talent in Scotland to be showcased, and wishes T in the Park every success for this year's event. Supported by: Brian Fitzpatrick, Scott Barrie, Mr Keith Harding, Donald Gorrie, Mr Tom McCabe, Tommy Sheridan, Michael Russell, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Cathie Craigie, Mr Keith Raffan, Margaret Jamieson, Bill Butler, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Kate Maclean, Nora Radcliffe, Murdo Fraser, Karen Gillon, Robin Harper, Helen Eadie, Karen Whitefield, Marilyn Livingstone
